text: Alloh taolo conhoro dar lahzai marg megirad va[niz] coni kasero, ki namurdaast, ʙa hangomi xoʙas [megirad], on goh conhoero, ki hukmi marg ʙar onho rondaast, nigah medorad va coni digaronro ʙozpas mefiristad, to hangomi muajjan [marg]. Dar in [amr] ʙaroi har ki ʙiandesad, nisonahoe [az qijomat] ast
